entry.title: Many little fixes, plus a much shorter feed
entry.content: The Contact and Credits sections are gone (I moved the info elsewhere) and the news feed preview's much shorter! Later, I'll write some kinda “Weird Waves history”; for now, I just wanted it to be more readable in feed readers.

entry.title: Lots of little layout changes
entry.content: I've tweaked the site's design: the theme- and font-pickers are now more-accessible select menus; various things are now left-aligned instead of centred; and the “+ Show” buttons in the archive no longer stay pushed in.

entry.title: Import/export updates
entry.content: Queue data now updates automatically whenever the queue changes, and the “Export” button that originally got you that data manually has been replaced with a “Copy” button to copy the data to your clipboard.

entry.title: Simplifying controls
entry.content: First, I got rid of the “+ Archive” button. Second, there's no more confirmation step when you clear the queue. Finally, you can now clear your queue by importing a blank box.

entry.title: Behind-the-scenes changes that might cause bugs
entry.content: There's been a major behind-the-scenes change to how the site works. It shouldn't affect the experience from the front, just make it easier for me to maintain. If you notice anything unusual, send me a message.
